title: Mixed Research Methods-Based Instructional Design for Selecting Science Competition Topics

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Mobile-based customized learning environment for in-service professionals. Includes digital device provision and post-hoc control group design application

learning_goals: Learners can compare and analyze science fair topic selection strategies using mixed research methods (surveys + case studies).
Learners can establish step-by-step implementation plans for topic development according to the Instruct-Expose-Explore-Formalise framework.
Learners can complete a project deliverable evaluating the effectiveness of topic selection methods by applying a post-criterion group design.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
